Description: The Flight into Egypt; Mary and the Christ child ride on a donkey accompanied by Joseph who holds a flaming torch; at right, is a shepherd's encampment with a large fire; at left, the moon is low in the sky and is reflected in a pool of water; a night-scene with the figures illuminated and highlighted by various light sources; after Elsheimer. 1780s Mezzotint
Producer name: Print made by: Johann Elias Haid
Curator's comments: The best version of the painting by Elsheimer is in the Alte Pinakothek, Munich (inv. 216; K. Andrews, 'Adam Elsheimer:Paintings-Drawings-Prints', London, 1977, no. 26).
Acquisition notes: For the history of the acquisition of the Sheepshanks collection, please see Sheepshanks.1
